Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local CAS = game:GetService("ContextActionService") local ActionName = "PenguinAttack"
local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
function onAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer("Activate", Mouse.Hit.p) end end
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
--bind CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( ActionName, onAction, false, Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1, Enum.UserInputType.Touch ) end
function onUnequipped() --unbind CAS:UnbindAction(ActionName) end
function playAnimation(name, ...) local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(name) if anim then local human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if human then local track = human:LoadAnimation(anim) track:Play(...) end end end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) end end
--connect Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)

local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local AmmoMeshData = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191294160"
local AttackAble = true local AttackReloadTime = 0.5
local Penguins = {}
function penguinsOut() for index, penguin in pairs(Penguins) do if not penguin.Parent then table.remove(Penguins, index) end end return #Penguins end
function R(lower, upper) return lower + (upper - lower) * math.random() end
function createAttackPenguin() local part = Instance.new("Part") part.FormFactor = "Custom" part.Size = Vector3.new(0.6, 0.6, 0.6) part.TopSurface = "Smooth" part.BottomSurface = "Smooth" part.Material = "SmoothPlastic" local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" mesh.MeshId = AmmoMeshData mesh.TextureId = Handle.Mesh.TextureId mesh.Parent = part local lift = Instance.new("BodyForce") lift.force = Vector3.new(0, 35, 0) lift.Parent = part part.Touched:connect(function(hit) if part:FindFirstChild("Cooldown") then return end if hit:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end
if lift.Parent then print("Start bouncing") lift:Destroy() spawn(function() while part.Parent do wait(0.75) part.Velocity = part.Velocity + Vector3.new(R(-10, 10), R(30, 60), R(-10, 10)) end end) else if hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = hit.Parent.Humanoid tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(10)
local cooldown = Instance.new("BoolValue") cooldown.Name = "Cooldown" cooldown.Parent = part game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(cooldown, 1) end end end) game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(part, 10)
return part end
function tagHuman(human) local val = Instance.new("ObjectValue") val.Name = "creator" val.Value = getPlayer() val.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(val, 1) end
function getLaunchPosition() return (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0.75, -0.9)).p end
function onActivate(targetPosition) if not AttackAble then return end
AttackAble = false delay(AttackReloadTime, function() AttackAble = true end)
if penguinsOut() < 15 then local penguin = createAttackPenguin() penguin.CFrame = CFrame.new(getLaunchPosition(), targetPosition) penguin.Velocity = penguin.CFrame.lookVector * 50 penguin.Parent = workspace table.insert(Penguins, penguin) end end
function getPlayer() return game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if player ~= getPlayer() then return end
if func == "Activate" then onActivate(...) end end
Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote)
